name: BNNS.FusedDequantizationParameters
desc: A structure that contains the parameters for a fused dequantization layer.

items.name: init(scale: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor?, bias: BNNSNDArrayDescriptor?)
items.desc: Returns a new fused dequantization parameters structure.

items.name: var axis: Int?
items.desc: The index of the axis on which the function applies scale and bias.
